name: litura
description: A minimalist CSS library focused on content
author: Amadeusz Prus <https://github.com/amadeuszprus>

scripts.lint: npm run lint:js && npm run lint:css && npm run lint:html
scripts.minify:css: cleancss -o min/index.min.css index.css && find core components utilities -name '*.css' -exec sh -c 'mkdir -p min/$(dirname {}) && cleancss -o min/{}.min.css {}' \;
scripts.minify:js: find js -name '*.js' -exec sh -c 'mkdir -p min/$(dirname {}) && terser {} -o min/{}.min.js' \;
scripts.minify: npm run minify:css && npm run minify:js
scripts.build: npm run lint && npm run minify
